meanings.definition: The condition of identifying with a gender different from the one assigned at birth.
meanings.sent1: Many people face challenges due to their transsexualisms.
meanings.sent2: Her transsexualisms led to a journey of self-discovery.
meanings.sent3: His friends found humor in his transsexualisms when he accidentally used the wrong restroom.
meanings.sent4: The artist used colors to represent the complexity of transsexualisms in their painting.
meanings.sent5: Understanding her transsexualisms helped her embrace her true self.

meanings.definition: The experience of living as a gender different from the one assigned at birth.
meanings.sent1: Support groups provide comfort for individuals navigating their transsexualisms.
meanings.sent2: Their transsexualisms shaped their unique perspective on life.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, his transsexualisms made for a hilarious mix-up.
meanings.sent4: The novel beautifully captures the struggles of transsexualisms through its protagonist.
meanings.sent5: Her transsexualisms empowered her to live authentically.
